mapper.update: UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST SET SUBHOLIDAY_WORK_DAY_YN = 'Y' WHERE SUBHOLIDAY_WORK_DAY = #{vacWorkDt} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID = '11'
mapper.select: SELECT VUH.*, VCD.SUBHOLIDAY_DT_CODE_NM FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST VUH JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_CODE VCD ON VUH.SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID = VCD.SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID WHERE VUH.SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID = '11' AND VUH.SUBHOLIDAY_WORK_DAY_YN = 'N'

/* getVacUseHistoryOne */ SELECT SUH.*, DATE_FORMAT(SUH.SAVE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SAVE_DT, SCD.SUBHOLIDAY_DT_CODE_NM, EI.EMP_NAME_KR, EI.DEPT_SEQ, EI.DEPT_NAME, EI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME, EI.POSITION_CODE, EI.POSITION_NAME, EI.DUTY_CODE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST SUH LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_CODE SCD ON SUH.SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID = SCD.SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO EI ON EI.EMP_SEQ = SUH.REG_EMP_SEQ WHERE SUH.SUBHOLIDAY_USE_ID = #{subholidayUseId}
mapper.update: /* updateRetrieveStat */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST SET APPR_STAT = #{status}, APPROVAL_SEND_DATE = null, APPROVAL_EMP_SEQ = null, DOC_ID = null WHERE SUBHOLIDAY_USE_ID = #{subholidayUseId}

/* setUserVacUpdate */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HOLIDAY SET GRANT_DAY = #{grantDay}, MDTN_DAY = #{mdtnDay}, REMAIN_DAY = CONCAT(#{grantDay} + #{mdtnDay} - #{useDay}), EXTRA_DAY = #{extraDay}, CARRYOVER_DAY = #{carryoverDay}, USE_DAY = #{useDay}, ADJUSTMENT_USE_DAY = #{adjustmentUseDay}, RMK = CONCAT(IFNULL(#{rmk}, '관리자 연차 수정')), MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{targetEmpSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{targetEmpSeq}
mapper.select: /* getUserBefHolyData */ SELECT IFNULL((SELECT USE_DAY FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HOLIDAY WHERE APPLY_YEAR = #{befYear}), 0) AS befYear, IFNULL((SELECT USE_DAY FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HOLIDAY WHERE APPLY_YEAR = #{befYear2}), 0) AS bef2Year, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST WHERE APPLY_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID = 1) AS ann, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST WHERE APPLY_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID in (3,4)) AS halfAnn, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST WHERE APPLY_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID in (5)) AS sickLv, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST WHERE APPLY_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID in (6)) AS pubHoly, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST WHERE APPLY_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID in (7)) AS congHoly, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST WHERE APPLY_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID in (8)) AS matHoly, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST WHERE APPLY_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID in (9)) AS altHoly, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST WHERE APPLY_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID in (10)) AS compHoly, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST WHERE APPLY_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID in (11)) AS workHoly FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HOLIDAY DH WHERE DH.ACTIVE = "Y" AND DH.EMP_SEQ = #{loginEmpSeq}
